snippet: They account for 29 percent of documentaries and 18 percent of features shown at American fests. By comparison, women only direct about 7 percent of top-grossing Hollywood movies.
abstract: They account for 29 percent of documentaries and 18 percent of features shown at American fests. By comparison, women only direct about 7 percent of top-grossing Hollywood movies.

headline.main: Female Directors Fare Better in Festivals Than in Hollywood, Study Finds

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Center for the Study of Women in Television and Film
